original_text: Be not afraid, ye beasts of the field: for the pastures of the wilderness do spring, for the tree beareth her fruit, the fig tree and the vine do yield their strength.
korean_text: 들짐승들아 두려워하지 말지어다 들의 풀이 싹이 나며 나무가 열매를 맺으며 무화과나무와 포도나무가 다 힘을 내는도다

sentences.original_text: for the pastures of the wilderness do spring
for the tree beareth her fruit
the fig tree and the vine do yield their strength
